description: The grown-up version of your favorite childhood treat, this vanilla vodka-pumpkin spiked milkshake is perfect for a fun and frosty drink. Drink it to celebrate life's simple pleasures!
name: Boozy Pumpkin Milkshake

recipeInstructions.name: Combine ice cream, pumpkin puree, vodka, and spice in a blender. Blend until smooth.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine ice cream, pumpkin puree, vodka, and spice in a blender. Blend until smooth.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour into glasses and drizzle with caramel sauce before serving. Top off with whipped cream for best results!
recipeInstructions.text: Pour into glasses and drizzle with caramel sauce before serving. Top off with whipped cream for best results!
